About

Jonathan Fuller serves as the Chief Information Security Officer and an Academy Professor at the United States Military Academy at West Point, leading enterprise cybersecurity strategy and governance in a mission-critical environment.

His work combines a Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering focused on cybersecurity with nearly two decades of Army experience in secure communications, cyber operations, and organizational leadership. This foundation supports Empirical Defense, a platform dedicated to evidence-based approaches that connect research, strategic governance, and education to strengthen resilience across complex digital ecosystems.

Air Force Institute of Technology — Dayton, OH

Advisor: Dr. Benjamin Ramsey

Thesis: A Misuse-Based Intrusion Detection System for ITU-T G.9959 Wireless Networks

B.S., Computer Science 2007

University of Alabama at Birmingham — Birmingham, AL
